Reviews.Title: “Brilliant - can't wait to go back”

Reviews.Content: spent night mon hotel paris brilliant honestly hotels ive experienced europe friendly staff incredibly comfortable bed element wonderful balcony nespresso machine bathtub possibly regret staying location excellent street quiet couldnt hear windows closed ive disappointed parisian hotels past mon hotel wonderful amazing deal jetsetter truly luxurious experience compared supposedly 4 star hotels ive stayed throughout europe definitely coming romantic weekend partner
